Description.Text: AZIMUT Hotel Vladivostok is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Vladivostok. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a beauty salon and a sauna. Vladivostok is a medium-sized city situated alongside Golden Horn Bay and close to the border of China and North Korea. Places of interest include the Arsenyev State Museum of Primorsky Region, the Port of Vladivostok, Svetlanskaya Street and Russky Bridge (the world's longest cable-stayed bridge). Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Vladivostok destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century mid-rise building with a minimalist facade. Facilities include a beauty salon and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a basic style with dark wood furniture. Amenities include a TV, radio, telephone and an en-suite bathroom with shower. AZIMUT Cafe DE KASS offers casual dining on the third floor, and guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the 24-hour AZIMUT Bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. ***The hotel will be temporarily closed for renovation from 09/01/2014 until further notice.***
